title: CIT ICON DIGITAL AWARDS
description: A pivotal part of Takshashila '24 is  CIDA (CIT Icons Digital Awards) which aims to honor and reward celebrities and influencers in the industry for their monumental contributions. The awardees are meticulously selected based on student polling, ensuring a fair and transparent process. With seven exciting categories, CIDA recognizes excellence in the digital realm and celebrates the impact of these influencers on our tech-savvy generation.
registration: The event comes under general registration.
